name: The More You Arm
description:
A game about a lazy man who lost his TV remote. Help him consume sports so he can turn on his TV!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 34 in 72 hours. The project scored an amazing 34th place in the innovation category, and 123rd overall, out of 2,867 games.

Timelapse video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cMw-ooYvwo0

Ludum Dare Page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=61240
